represented as digits to one decimal place

10.0). In extensible business reporting
language global ledger taxonomy framework
(XBRL GL), the three fields
Terms_Discount_Percentage,
Terms_Discount_Days and
Terms_Due_Days would be entered in the
form "xx.x% dd Net dd," such as 2% 10 Net
30 for 2% discount if paid within 10 days,
with the net due in 30 days.
